page.title: 16SPRINGFIELD, TEMPLETON.
page.content: Springfield Cottages provide self-catering holiday accommodation for summer visitors.The five cottages were converted from farm buildings in 1981. Heather Cottage was the milking parlour,Rose Cottage was the hay loft, Primrose,Snowdrop and Lilac Cottages were the stables.The buildings are 200 years old. Springfield Cottages are approved by the Wales Tourist Board. There is a shop which sells milk, groceries and home made cakes and pastries.The owners hold barbecues in the evening, once a week, depending upon the weather. Ashwood Chalets also provide self - catering accommodation.The site is situated on the Haverfordwest Road.
